entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.

High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
